info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 5 at 11:04AM CDT until July 5 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Austin/San Antonio TX
info.description:
FFWEWX
The National Weather Service in Austin/San Antonio has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... East Central Comal County in south central Texas...
* Until 215 PM CDT.
* At 1104 AM CDT, Local law enforcement reported flooding of the Guadalupe River along River Road. Between 4 and 6 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing along the river. Please evacuate immediately. If unable to do so, move to higher ground.
This is a FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY for River Road along the Guadalupe River. This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW!
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Law enforcement reported.
IMPACT...This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW! Life threatening river flooding is occurring.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... River Road below Canyon Lake
info.instruction:
Move to higher ground now! This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation.
Move to higher ground now. Act quickly to protect your life.
Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.

parameter.value: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY FOR RIVER ROAD ALONG THE GUADALUPE RIVER
NWS: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY this area til 2:15 PM CDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY is in effect for this area until 2:15 PM CDT. This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY FOR RIVER ROAD ALONG THE GUADALUPE RIVER
SNM: EMERGENCIA DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 2:15 PM CDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: EMERGENCIA DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 2:15 PM CDT. Esta es una situacion extremadamente peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
